content.prompt: The writer wants to add a sentence after sentence 7 to expand on the narrative in the second paragraph and provide additional context for the third paragraph. Which of the following choices best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: These self-ratings were then compared to the assessments of researchers who listened to the subjects’ audio recordings.
It took the researchers a long time to transcribe data from the audio recordings of the subjects.
Vazire and Sun’s test subjects were mostly students at Washington University in St. Louis, Missouri.
Vazire was Sun’s graduate advisor at the time of the study, although they copublished the results.

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Use appropriate methods of development to advance an argument.
